basic_info.description:
I am Keshava Pranath. 
      I am  an AI Engineer and Software Engineer skilled in Python, JavaScript, Databases and Web-development. 
      My interests lie in finding simple yet efficient solutions ways to tackle any instance. I am like an outdoor cat - curious to explore and roam around in my leisure. I love adventure activities and I love sports. I spend my weekends playing Crikciet.

projects.title: Real-Time Object Detection using YOLOv8 and DeepSORT
projects.description: Real-Time Object detection and Tracking for vehicles on the videos using Computer Vision and Deep Learning. A YOLOv8 model used to detect objects in the frame and DeepSort model used to track the detected object. Both models fine-tuned to detect and track multiple objects in the frame. NVIDIA TensorRT used to optimise the performance for higher frame-rates and perform better with different occulation and varying light conditions.

projects.title: AI-Powered Image Colorization Agent
projects.description: CNN-based AI agent that colorizes black-and-white images using deep learning. A React app that alllows user to feed the image into the model using a flask API and renders the color image as response.

projects.title: Traffic Decongestion using Reinforcement Learning
projects.description: App that help identify and prevent traffic congestion in the city of Bangalore. Vehicles run as agent on the environment(map of Bangalore) working with the traffic density data frfom the TOMTOM API to provide the best route to prevent the congestion.

projects.title: TecRidge: A Developer Platform for Students to Explore and Collaborate
projects.description: A React and NodeJS web app that connects the students in the college with fellow students to work on the projects and collaborate.

experience.company: The University of Transdisciplinary Health Sciences and Technology
experience.title: Intern
